name: DarkCulture by Rune [detune.org]
description:
Like many people, I don't like staring at a lightbulb in a dark room. I visit WhatCulture often, and I find it a crime that nobody has made a dark theme yet. So, I made one!

Hey, if you like this style, please check out my forum and chat website! http://detune.org/

If you're a wrestling fan, we do have a wrestling section! I'd really like to make it grow so please check it out as well! http://detune.org/boards/wrestling
additional_info:
Current Version version 1.0.5

Changelog

  • version 1.0.5 - Fixed the changes that broke background. Still haven't gotten around to fixing navbar though.
  • version 1.0.4 - Recolored new Post Tile classes.
  • version 1.0.3 - Blockquotes are grey now.
  • version 1.0.2 - Facebook iframe doesn't accept style injection. Comments given lighter grey background instead.
  • version 1.0.1 - missed the 'WhatCulture Elsewhere' section
  • version 1.0.0 - Initial version
